009package imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving;
010
011import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.Kernel2D;
012import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
013import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
014
015
016/**
017 * Common interface for Tschumperle-Deriche filter implementations.
018 * 
019 * @author WB
020 */
021public interface TschumperleDericheF {
022        
023        /**
024         * Parameter bundle for Tschumperle-Deriche filters (implementations of {@link TschumperleDericheF}).
025         */
026        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
027                
028                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("Number of iterations")
029                public int iterations = 20;     
030                
031                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("dt (Time step)")
032                public double dt = 20.0;                
033                
034                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("Gradient smoothing (sigmaD)")
035                public double sigmaD  = 0.5;
036                
037                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("Structure tensor smoothing (sigmaM)")
038                public double sigmaM  = 0.5;
039                
040                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("Diffusion limiter along minimal variations (a0)")     //small value = strong smoothing
041                public float a0 = 0.25f;        
042                
043                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("Diffusion limiter along maximal variations (a1)")     //small value = strong smoothing
044                public float a1 = 0.90f;
045                
046                /** The alpha value applied in the first pass. */
047                @DialogUtils.DialogHide
048                public float alpha0 = 0.5f;
049        }
050        
051
052        abstract class Constants {
053                private static final float C1 = (float) (2 - Math.sqrt(2.0)) / 4;
054                private static final float C2 = (float) (Math.sqrt(2.0) - 1) / 2;
055
056                private static final float[][] Hdx = // gradient kernel X
057                        {{-C1, 0, C1},
058                         {-C2, 0, C2},
059                         {-C1, 0, C1}};
060                
061                private static final float[][] Hdy = // gradient kernel Y
062                        {{-C1, -C2, -C1},
063                         {  0,   0,   0},
064                         { C1,  C2,  C1}};
065                
066                protected static final Kernel2D kernelDx = new Kernel2D(Hdx, 1, 1, false);
067                protected static final Kernel2D kernelDy = new Kernel2D(Hdy, 1, 1, false);
068        }
069        
070
071        
072
073}
